  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void asignPlace​(int numberMaterials, java.lang.String[] stage, java.lang.String[] materials, double[] bestPrice, java.lang.String[] bestPlace)
    Prints what the best price, place and and name of a material for x category pre: Materials array has to be ready and the best prices and places to buy every material have to have been calculated and stored accordingly
    post: Returns a String with the best place, price and name of every material comparing its index inside a category array with the material's list
    java.lang.String bestPlace​(double bestPrice, double homeCenter, double ferreteriaBarrio, double ferreteriaCentro)
    Shows what the best place to purchase an item is depending on its price pre: The best price amongst 3 previously inputted prices has to be calculated and saved to be compared
    post: Returns a String with the name of the best place to purchase x item comparing its price at x store with the best price found amongst all stores
    double bestPrice​(double a, double b, double c)
    Returns the smallest between three numbers pre:
    post: Calculates what the best price for x item is
    double sumTotal​(double[] bestPrice, java.lang.String location)
    Calculates the delivery fee of the products based on the user's location pre: Saved an array containing the best prices and saved the location of the user
    post: Returns the delivery fee based on location and total cost of items

  • Method Details

    • bestPrice

      public double bestPrice​(double a, double b, double c)
      Returns the smallest between three numbers pre:
      post: Calculates what the best price for x item is
      Parameters:
      a - Price in store #1
      b - Price in store #2
      c - Price in store #3

    • bestPlace

      public java.lang.String bestPlace​(double bestPrice, double homeCenter, double ferreteriaBarrio, double ferreteriaCentro)
      Shows what the best place to purchase an item is depending on its price pre: The best price amongst 3 previously inputted prices has to be calculated and saved to be compared
      post: Returns a String with the name of the best place to purchase x item comparing its price at x store with the best price found amongst all stores
      Parameters:
      bestPrice - Best price amongst those introduced by user (at different stores)
      homeCenter - Price at Home Center
      ferreteriaBarrio - Price at Ferreteria del Barrio
      ferreteriaCentro - Price at Ferreteria del Centro

    • sumTotal

      public double sumTotal​(double[] bestPrice, java.lang.String location)
      Calculates the delivery fee of the products based on the user's location pre: Saved an array containing the best prices and saved the location of the user
      post: Returns the delivery fee based on location and total cost of items
      Parameters:
      bestPrice - best price amongst those introduced by user. bestPrice != null.
      location - user's location. location != "".

    • asignPlace

      public void asignPlace​(int numberMaterials, java.lang.String[] stage, java.lang.String[] materials, double[] bestPrice, java.lang.String[] bestPlace)
      Prints what the best price, place and and name of a material for x category pre: Materials array has to be ready and the best prices and places to buy every material have to have been calculated and stored accordingly
      post: Returns a String with the best place, price and name of every material comparing its index inside a category array with the material's list
      Parameters:
      numberMaterials - total amount of items. numberMaterials > 0.
      stage - array of all items belonging to x category.
      materials - list of all materials inputted by the user.
      bestPrice - best price to buy x item. bestPrice != null.
      bestPlace - best place to purchase x item.
